items.title: Magic of simplicity to beat online poker

items.headline: Practical training course to win at poker
objectives_summary: Learn how to win at poker and be able to make better decisions.
Increase your confidence in playing poker.
Become a consistent winning player

items.title: Pot Limit Omaha Poker for Beginners - Learn PLO quickly
items.headline: Learn the Basics that Allow You to Easily Beat Recreational Players and Crush Home Games
objectives_summary: You will learn basic PLO concepts that allow you to easily beat recreational players
You will learn how to play this game in a way you're a massive favourite over casual players
You will learn how to become a winning player in your local home games

items.title: Chess Strategy - Complete Training Course
items.headline: This course will bring your strategic understanding to a whole new level, allowing you to evaluate complex positions.
objectives_summary: A method to evaluate positions strategically
Clearly understand the difference between chess strategy and chess tactics
Know when to focus on strategic play

items.title: Become a proficient chess player for complete beginners
items.headline: Complete beginner to proficient chess player
objectives_summary: Naming the chess squares
How the chess pieces move
What check, double-check, and checkmate is.

items.title: The Complete Chess Tactics Bootcamp
items.headline: Learn and practice Chess Tactics like a Pro
objectives_summary: Have a clear-cut method to find tactical ideas in any position
Dominate the most common chess tactics
Learn and practice less common tactics

items.title: Chess middlegames - complete training
items.headline: Become a great middlegame player and win much more games
objectives_summary: Students will improve their chess skills significantly and therefore win more games.

items.title: London System. White full opening repertoire (2021 edition)
items.headline: Quality opening chess course with practice, challenges, my own games and ready to use line trees
objectives_summary: All existing London system plans and ideas
Tactics, trics
The right order of moves

items.title: Tutorials on how to play Minecraft
items.headline: Minecraft
objectives_summary: They will learn how to play Minecraft, so they can play on any world or server.

items.title: Chess openings: The italian game
items.headline: How to win with White in the open games
objectives_summary: At the end of the course you will have a solid opening repertoire with white.
You will know the correct move orders to reach advantageous positions in the italian game.
You will understand the middlegame positions that arise from this opening.

objectives_summary: At the end of the course you will have a solid opening repertoire with white.

optimize your TTK(time to kill).
